remarks: Virtual deduction proof of the left-to-right implication of ~ dftr4 .  A transitive class is a subset of its power class.  This proof corresponds to the virtual deduction proof of ~ dftr4 without accumulating results. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 29-Apr-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: trsspwALT $p |- ( Tr A -> A C_ ~P A ) $.
